SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.task.lifecycle

Interface Scheduler

All Superinterfaces:
ThreadedModule
All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncScheduler, SchedulerThread, SyncScheduler
public interface Scheduler extends ThreadedModule
A scheduler can execute tasks according to the task's interval.
See Also:
  • Task
  • ThreadedModule
  • SyncScheduler
  • AsyncScheduler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T extends Task>
    T
    getTask(Class<T> c)
    Searches for a task by the class of the task, then returns the first instance of the task found.
    List<Task>
    getTasks()
    Returns a list containing every task currently registered to this scheduler.
    boolean
    isRegistered(Task t)
    Returns whether the given task instance is currently registered to this scheduler.
    void
    register(Task t)
    Registers a task to this scheduler.
    void
    registerAsync(Iterable<Task> i)
    Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler asynchronously, evenly distributing the tasks across each thread of this scheduler.
    void
    registerSync(Iterable<Task> i)
    Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler synchronously, registering all tasks to a single thread.
    void
    unregister(Task t)
    Unregisters a task from this scheduler.
    void
    unregister(Iterable<Task> i)
    Unregisters multiple tasks from this scheduler.

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(@Nonnull Task t)
      Registers a task to this scheduler.
      Parameters:
      t - The task to register to this scheduler

    • registerSync

      void registerSync(@Nonnull Iterable<Task> i)
      Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler synchronously, registering all tasks to a single thread.
      Parameters:
      i - The iterable object containing the tasks to register

    • registerAsync

      void registerAsync(@Nonnull Iterable<Task> i)
      Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler asynchronously, evenly distributing the tasks across each thread of this scheduler.
      Parameters:
      i - The iterable object containing the tasks to register

    • getTasks

      @Nonnull List<Task> getTasks()
      Returns a list containing every task currently registered to this scheduler.
      Returns:
      A copied unmodifiable list containing every task of this scheduler

    • getTask

      @Nonnull <T extends Task> T getTask(@Nonnull Class<T> c) throws NoSuchElementException
      Searches for a task by the class of the task, then returns the first instance of the task found.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of task to get
      Parameters:
      c - The class of task to get
      Returns:
      The first task instance of the given class c
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - When a task of matching class cannot be found

    • isRegistered

      boolean isRegistered(@Nonnull Task t)
      Returns whether the given task instance is currently registered to this scheduler.
      Parameters:
      t - The task to check for registration
      Returns:
      true if the task is currently registered to this scheduler
